name: Big Tear
description:
In a general exploration mission, your crews have missed one after another.

Your officer has given you the last nine days to find your crews.

You will face illusions in this strange area, and you may also see your real crews through the big tear.

What you have to do in these nine days:

Fixed the dark energy collider and cause a big tear, so you can meet your real crews and then get them back to ship.

Team:

Fry,  Zoi
